message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair deal. I'm offering it to you for $13000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $11000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $12500 for the product.
